item.title: Prayer Is Friend Talk
item.description: This is an undated, typed sermon with a handwritten closing, as well as some handwritten corrections. I’m going to guess this as coming from 1973? It was originally listed as being from Trinity XXI, but that was crossed out and 22 Pentecost C was written over it. Technically, Luke 18 is now a part of 19 Pent C in the RCL.
